```lean4
import Mathlib

open Filter Topology

/--
For any real number $\alpha$, define the function $f_\alpha(x)=\lfloor \alpha x \rfloor$. Let $n$ be a positive integer. Show that there exists an $\alpha$ such that for $1 \leq k \leq n$, $f_\alpha^k(n^2)=n^2-k=f_{\alpha^k}(n^2)$.
-/
theorem putnam_1994_b5
  (n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
  (f : ℝ → ℤ → ℤ)
  (hf : ∀ (α : ℝ) (x : ℤ), f α x = Int.floor (α * x)) :
  ∃ α : ℝ,
    ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n,
      ((f α)^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) ∧
      (f (α ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1994_b5
  (n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
  (f : ℝ → ℤ → ℤ)
  (hf : ∀ (α : ℝ) (x : ℤ), f α x = Int.floor (α * x)) :
  ∃ α : ℝ,
    ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n,
      ((f α)^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) ∧
      (f (α ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
  use n
  intro k hk
  have h₁ : ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n, ((f (n : ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) ∧ (f (n ^ k : ℝ) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
    intro k hk
    have h₂ : ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n, ((f (n : ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
      intro k hk
      have h₃ : ∀ k : ℕ, ((f (n : ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
        intro k
        induction k with
        | zero => simp [hf, Function.iterate_zero, Int.floor_eq_iff]
        | succ k ih =>
          simp_all [Function.iterate_succ', hf, Int.floor_eq_iff]
          <;> ring_nf at *
          <;> omega
      exact h₃ k
    have h₄ : ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n, (f (n ^ k : ℝ) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
      intro k hk
      have h₅ : ∀ k : ℕ, k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n → (f (n ^ k : ℝ) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
        intro k hk
        have h₆ : k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n := hk
        have h₇ : k ≤ n := hk.2
        have h₈ : 1 ≤ k := hk.1
        have h₉ : (f (n ^ k : ℝ) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
          simp_all [hf, Int.floor_eq_iff]
          <;> ring_nf at *
          <;> norm_cast
          <;> omega
        exact h₉
      exact h₅ k hk
    exact ⟨h₂ k hk, h₄ k hk⟩
  exact h₁ k hk
```

```lean4
theorem putnam_1994_b5
  (n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
  (f : ℝ → ℤ → ℤ)
  (hf : ∀ (α : ℝ) (x : ℤ), f α x = Int.floor (α * x)) :
  ∃ α : ℝ,
    ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n,
      ((f α)^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) ∧
      (f (α ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
  use n
  intro k hk
  have h₁ := hk.1
  have h₂ := hk.2
  have h₃ : ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n, ((f (n:ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) ∧ (f (n ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
    intro k hk
    have h₄ : k ≥ 1 := hk.1
    have h₅ : k ≤ n := hk.2
    have h₆ : ((f (n:ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
      have h₇ : ∀ k : ℕ, ((f (n:ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
        intro k
        induction k with
        | zero => simp [hf, Function.iterate_zero, Function.comp_apply]
        | succ k ih =>
          simp_all [hf, Function.iterate_succ', Function.comp_apply, Int.floor_eq_iff]
          <;> ring_nf
          <;> norm_num
          <;> omega
      exact h₇ k
    have h₇ : (f (n ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
      have h₈ : ∀ k : ℕ, (f (n ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
        intro k
        induction k with
        | zero => simp [hf, Function.iterate_zero, Function.comp_apply]
        | succ k ih =>
          simp_all [hf, Function.iterate_succ', Function.comp_apply, Int.floor_eq_iff]
          <;> ring_nf
          <;> norm_num
          <;> omega
      exact h₈ k
    exact ⟨h₆, h₇⟩
  exact h₃ k hk
```

theorem putnam_1994_b5
  (n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
  (f : ℝ → ℤ → ℤ)
  (hf : ∀ (α : ℝ) (x : ℤ), f α x = Int.floor (α * x)) :
  ∃ α : ℝ,
    ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n,
      ((f α)^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) ∧
      (f (α ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
  use n
  intro k hk
  have h₁ : ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n, ((f (n : ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) ∧ (f (n ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
    intro k hk
    have h₂ : k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n := hk
    have h₃ : 1 ≤ k := by exact h₂.1
    have h₄ : k ≤ n := by exact h₂.2
    have h₅ : ((f (n : ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
      have h₆ : ∀ k : ℕ, ((f (n : ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
        intro k
        induction k with
        | zero => simp [hf]
        | succ k ih =>
          simp_all [Function.iterate_succ_apply', hf, Int.floor_eq_iff]
          <;> ring_nf
          <;> norm_num
          <;> omega
      exact h₆ k
    have h₆ : (f (n ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
      have h₇ : ∀ k : ℕ, (f (n ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
        intro k
        induction k with
        | zero => simp [hf]
        | succ k ih =>
          simp_all [hf, pow_succ, Int.floor_eq_iff]
          <;> ring_nf
          <;> norm_num
          <;> omega
      exact h₇ k
    exact ⟨h₅, h₆⟩
  exact h₁ k hk

theorem putnam_1994_b5
  (n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
  (f : ℝ → ℤ → ℤ)
  (hf : ∀ (α : ℝ) (x : ℤ), f α x = Int.floor (α * x)) :
  ∃ α : ℝ,
    ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n,
      ((f α)^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) ∧
      (f (α ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
  use n
  intro k hk
  have h₁ : ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n, ((f (n : ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) ∧ (f (n ^ k : ℝ) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
    intro k hk
    have hk' : k ≤ n := by exact hk.2
    have hk'' : 1 ≤ k := by exact hk.1
    have h₁ : ((f (n : ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
      have h₂ : ∀ k : ℕ, ((f (n : ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
        intro k
        induction k with
        | zero => simp [hf, Function.iterate_zero, Int.floor_eq_iff]
        | succ k ih =>
          simp_all [hf, Function.iterate_succ_apply', Int.floor_eq_iff]
          <;> ring_nf at *
          <;> norm_cast at *
          <;> omega
      exact h₂ k
    have h₂ : (f (n ^ k : ℝ) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
      have h₃ : ∀ k : ℕ, (f (n ^ k : ℝ) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
        intro k
        induction k with
        | zero => simp [hf, Int.floor_eq_iff]
        | succ k ih =>

          <;> ring_nf at *
          <;> norm_cast at *
          <;> omega
      exact h₃ k
    exact ⟨h₁, h₂⟩
  exact h₁ k hk

theorem putnam_1994_b5
  (n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
  (f : ℝ → ℤ → ℤ)
  (hf : ∀ (α : ℝ) (x : ℤ), f α x = Int.floor (α * x)) :
  ∃ α : ℝ,
    ∀ k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n,

    intro k hk
    have h₂ : k ∈ Set.Icc 1 n := hk
    have h₃ : 1 ≤ k := by exact hk.1
    have h₄ : k ≤ n := by exact hk.2
    have h₅ : ((f (1 : ℝ))^[k] (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
      induction k with
      | zero => simp_all [hf, Function.iterate_zero, Int.floor_eq_iff]
      | succ k ih =>
        simp_all [hf, Function.iterate_succ', Int.floor_eq_iff]
        <;> ring_nf at *
        <;> norm_num at *
        <;> omega
    have h₆ : (f (1 ^ k) (n ^ 2) = n ^ 2 - k) := by
      have h₇ : (1 : ℝ) ^ k = 1 := by norm_num
      simp_all [hf, Int.floor_eq_iff]
      <;> ring_nf at *
      <;> norm_num at *
      <;> omega
    exact ⟨h₅, h₆⟩
  exact h₁ k hk
```
